snippet.title: Kaze no Tani no Nausicaä (風の谷のナウシカ) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Kaze no Tani no Nausicaä is an adventure game based on the popular movie "Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind".
Nausicaä has to collect items in the village by going from house to house. However, if she gets three skulls the game will end.

After that she has to use her glider.
